---
title: 12 January 2024
type: release
---

<h3>New features</h3>

üåç In February, Swan IBANs will be able to receive incoming SWIFT transfers.
To help you prepare for this new feature, you can test the reception of an incoming International Credit Transfer using our [Testing API](/topics/payments/credit-transfers/international/sandbox) `simulateIncomingInternationalCreditTransferReception` or Event Simulator.

<h3>Improvements</h3>

üí≥ Card option and spending limit values are displayed in the consent screen language instead of English by default.

üÜî To simulate different stages of the identification process for Sandbox users, you can now use the Event Simulator or the [Testing API](https://explorer.swan.io/?&tab=test-api) with the createSandboxIdentification and updateSandboxIdentification mutations.
Additionally, we deprecated the `identificationStatus` and `identificationLevels` fields when creating and updating Sandbox users from the Dashboard.
